Class ConnectorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.ckeditor.ConnectorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ConnectorImpl
extends Object
implements Connector

    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • resolvePath

        public String resolvePath(ConnectorContext ctx,
                 String path)
        Description copied from interface: Connector
        Resolve a path substituting any aliases.

        The ConnectorContext.getCurrentWorkingDirectory() may not be available when this is called since this method may be used to resolve the path to determine the CWD. Implementations of this method should check the CWD for null if needed.

        Specified by:
        resolvePath in interface Connector
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context.
        path - the path.
        Returns:
        the resolved path.

        Description copied from interface: Connector
        Write the CKEditor config for the specified context. CKEditorConfigBuilder can be used to help write out the javascript config.
        Specified by:
        writeCKEditorConfig in interface Connector
        Parameters:
        ctx - the context.
        out - the output stream.
